problem_text_cn: 如图,E为平行四边形ABCD内一点,且EA=EB=EC,若∠D=50°,则∠AEC的度数是()
problem_text_en: As shown in the figure, E is a point in the parallelogram ABCD, and EA = EB = EC, if ∠D = N_0, then the degree of ∠AEC is ()
raw_answer: 解:∵四边形ABCD是平行四边形,∴∠ABC=∠D=50°,∵EA=EB=EC,∴∠EAB=∠EBA,∠EBC=∠ECB,∴∠EAB+∠ECB=∠EBA+∠EBC=∠ABC=50°,∴∠AEB+∠BEC=(180°-∠EAB-∠EBA)+(180°-∠EBC-∠ECB)=360°-(∠EAB+∠ECB+∠EBA+∠EBC)=360°-100°=260°,∴∠AEC=360°-∠AEB-∠BEC=100°．故选:C．
raw_comment: 此题考查了平行四边形的性质与等腰三角形的性质．此题难度适中,注意数形结合思想与整体思想的应用．
